name: SPOOKIE (SilentYetiGames)
description:
Controls

Move: W,A,S,D

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

How long can you trick or treat, stay out as long as you can to ramp up the score!

random houses will offer a treat to help you, or maybe a trick, like spawning a horde of sugar driven toddlers after the candy you worked so hard for!  

fight your way through hordes of caffeinated adults with small angry little turbo tornados, teens with anger issues, and the worst of all 8th graders with their shifty eyes.

- four main enemies

- two bosses 

- pick-ups 

- fast paced shooter

made for Spooky 2D Game Jam 2022.
